titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Len Coombs

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Len Coombs 2003-05
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English.

change.item: Converted to EAD2002 using Word macro and Xmetal
Original encoding in EAD ver. 1.0 from Word 6.0 file using word macros and manual tagging in A/E.

titlepage.publisher:
Michigan Historical Collections
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Polar Bear Association photograph collection. 1930.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.abstract: Photographs of memorial ceremonies at the Polar Bear Memorial in White Chapel Memorial Park Cemetery, Troy, Michigan.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by the Polar Bear Association, in 1964 (Donor no.: 4145).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., Polar Bear Association photograph collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

scopecontent.p: The collection contains photographs from unknown sources and includes scenes of the burial of the bodies returned in 1929 and memorial services at the Polar Bear Memorial at White Chapel Memorial Park Cemetery.
